Package com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.model

Class Day

java.lang.Object
com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.model.Day
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Day extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a day with date, meals and water
Author:
Davide Mazzatenta

      public Map<AllNutrientNonNutrient,Float> getSumValues()
      Puts in a map the total quantity of nutrients or not nutrients in a day.
      Returns:
      the daily quantity of nutrients or not nutrients

    • addFood

      public void addFood(MealType mealType, Food food)
      Adds food to a specific meal in a day and if there isn't that type of meal in the meal list it creates one and adds the food.
      Parameters:
      mealType - of the meal: breakfast, lunch, snack or dinner
      food - to add in that meal

    • addWater

      public void addWater(Water water)
      Adds water to the water list
      Parameters:
      water - to add

    • getTotalCalories

      public float getTotalCalories()
      Calculates the total calories of a day through meals, that is based on the method in Meal class that calculate total calories of a meal through foods.
      Returns:
      the day total calories

    • calculate

      public <T> float calculate(Class<T> myClass)
      Calculate the quantity of nutrients and not nutrients or the volume of water in a day. It's based on the method in Meal Class that calculates the quantity of nutrients and not nutrients in a meal and on the the method in Water Class that get the volume of water.
      Type Parameters:
      T - means that the method will be dealing with generic type
      Parameters:
      myClass - is a class object of a specific class type . It can be a String, an Integer or a Object
      Returns:
      nutrient and not nutrient or water quantity in a day
